org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.datasource

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.datasource.DataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable

    public class DataSource
extends Object
implements Externalizable
    Data source abstraction to specify configuration of the Cassandra session to be used.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setSessionExpirationTimeout

        public void setSessionExpirationTimeout(long sessionExpirationTimeout)
        Sets expiration timeout for Cassandra driver session. Idle sessions that are not used during this timeout value will be automatically closed and recreated later on demand.

        If set to 0, timeout is disabled.

        Default value is DFLT_SESSION_EXPIRATION_TIMEOUT.

        Parameters:
        sessionExpirationTimeout - Expiration timeout for Cassandra driver session.

      • session

        public CassandraSession session(IgniteLogger log)
        Creates Cassandra session wrapper if it wasn't created yet and returns it
        Parameters:
        log - logger
        Returns:
        Cassandra session wrapper
